name: flippz
description: Reversi- 's time has come; introducing Flippz. A refreshed online multiplayer experience for a game that never gets old.

scripts.build: gulp build && echo You can now run the server with "node ./dist/app.js"
scripts.start: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/app.js
scripts.dev: echo Building files... && npm run build && echo Starting gulp livewatch and server. && concurrently " gulp dev " " nodemon "

author: Nadine Kuo, Mitchell Rademaker (https://mitchells.work)
